description: Try our easy to follow Eggplant And Chickpea Bites With Chili Coconut Yoghurt Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Arancini & croquette,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Mother's Day,Halal,High tea,Christmas,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Eggplant And Chickpea Bites With Chili Coconut Yoghurt Dip Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the yoghurt dip, put yoghurt, juice and a pinch of salt in a small bowl and stir to combine. Sprinkle with chilli flakes and set aside in the fridge.
Pierce cut side of eggplants with a fork, then drizzle with olive oil and season. Cook for 25 minutes or until tender.
Scoop out eggplant into the bowl of a food processor. Add chickpeas, garlic, cumin and salt and process until just combined.
Form a heaped tablespoon of eggplant mixture into a small patty. Coat lightly in flour, dip in milk and roll in breadcrumbs. Repeat with all remaining filling.

Place a sheet of paper towel on a plate. Heat enough vegetable oil to cover the base of a large frying pan. Shallow fry patties for 2 minutes each side over medium-high heat, or until golden brown and heated through. Drain on paper towel and sprinkle with salt. Serve immediately with tzatziki dip, lemon wedges and parsley.
until golden brown. Transfer to prepared plate. Arrange on serving plate and season with salt. Serve immediately with chilli yoghurt dip and lemon wedges
